info.title: Notification Service Service API

get.description: Retrieves the channel specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the channel to get

put.description: Update the channel specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated channel will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the channel to update

parameters.name: updateChannelInformation
parameters.description: A boolean to set the channel to active or inactive

get.description: Retrieves channels filtered by channel type

parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: channelType
parameters.description: The type to search by

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Include inactive channels

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.summary: Search EmailMessages by search terms and filters

parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: whether to sort ascending or descending

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: value to search

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: How to sort result. Must be one of the allowable values.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter on status. Must be one of the allowable values.

parameters.name: filterRead
parameters.description: Filter based on whether or not the EmailMessage has been read

documentId.description: DocumentID of the file stored in Document service

isActive.description: Flag for if the channel is active

tenantId.description: ID of the Tenant in which the resource is stored

entityId.description: ID of the Entity in which the resource is stored

contactId.description: The ContextualIdV1 of a Contact the Message matched to

customerId.description: The ContextualIdV1 of a Customer the Message matched to

matchedValue.description: The value that was matched on the message

id.description: Unique id of the email address information

entityId.description: Id of the entity the email address information is related to

createdOn.description: When the email address information was created

updatedOn.description: When the email address information was last modified

displayName.description: The display name/user name for the email address information

emailAddress.description: The email address for the email address information

isPrimary.description: Denotes if the email address information is the primary one for the entity

isVerified.description: Denotes if the email address information has been verified

provider.description: The provider for the email address information

providerInformation.description: Provider specific information for the email address information

attachments.description: List of attachments of the email

subject.description: The subject field of the email

communicationId.description: The ContextualIdV1 of the Communication Log created when the message was matched

contentType.description: Email content type. Can be either TEXT or HTML.

hasAttachments.description: If the email message has attachments

matchStatus.description: Match status, can be one of: EXACT_MATCH, MULTIPLE_MATCHES, NO_MATCH

matches.description: The potential Customer matches found for this message

providerEmailId.description: The email provider id of the email

providerFolderId.description: The email provider id of the email's folder

userId.description: The id of the user whose email this is

emailContent.description: The content of the email to send

recipients.description: List of recipients to send the email to

senderEmailAddressId.description: The email address id of the sender

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

oauthAuthorizeUrl.description: Authorize URL, used to redirect user to OAuth server authentication & consent page.

redirectUri.description: URI where OAuth2 server should redirect user to

scopes.description: OAuth2 scopes required for Vertafore integration

state.description: State that uniquely identifies OAuth2 request
